sourcesContent: /* eslint-disable react-hooks/rules-of-hooks */ import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Grid, Label, Select, Checkbox, Button, Popup, } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { countryOptions, jobOptions } from "assets/selectableOptions"; import withSelect from "components/hoc/selectHOC"; export default function UserForm() { let [deal, setDeal] = useState(0); return ( {/* with setDeal(0)} > Quote } /> ); }
